attributes.action: Create an NHS Bank Holiday on 5th July each year , the anniversary of the NHS
attributes.additional_details: The NHS has shown time and time again how valuable it is and the fight against COVID-19 shows how, even after retirement, the dedicated staff members of our beloved NHS will come back to put themselves in harms way to help save lives. Each year we should have a day set aside where we celebrate the entire staff of this amazing service. Giving people the chance to fundraise, have open days, send messages of love and support and give thanks for their efforts 24/7, 365 days a year.
attributes.background: Create a national bank holiday each year called NHS appreciation day so that we can all remember how hard our amazing NHS works

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
